name: verticox
description: Cox proportional hazards algorithm for vertically split data

functions.name: column_names
functions.description: Retrieve column names of the nodes (will become obsolete)

arguments.name: feature_columns
arguments.description: Columns that need to be treated as covariates

arguments.name: event_times_column
arguments.description: Column that holds time of event

arguments.name: event_happened_column
arguments.description: Column that indicates whether either an event happened, or the record is right-censored

arguments.name: include_value
arguments.description: The value that indicates event should be included (not right-censored

arguments.name: datanode_ids
arguments.description: The organization ids of the nodes that need to be treated as datanodes (nodes that contain the features)

arguments.name: central_node_id
arguments.description: Organization id of the node that contains the outcome data

arguments.name: precision
arguments.description: Precision of verticox algorithm. Determines when the algorithm has been converged

arguments.name: rho
arguments.description: Penalty parameter, determines the step size

arguments.name: database
arguments.description: Database name. Used to pass the name of the database to partial algorithms. Might become obsolete in the future.

functions.name: fit
functions.description: Fits the Cox proportional hazards model
